serviceAccountName.description: Optional service account that the workload entry runs as. If unspecified the workload entry will use the default service account of the namespace it belongs to.

endpoints.description: List of endpoints that are part of this workload.

istio.vms.v1alpha1.Endpoint.description: Endpoint defines the addresses of the workload entry.

addresses.description: List of addresses that are part of this workload.
